CARIN Blue Button Diagnosis Type Value Set

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct/5991000124107/version/20170901
    CodeDisplay
    principalprincipal
    secondarysecondary
    patient reason for visitpatient reason for visit
    external cause of injuryexternal cause of injury
